attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have been fighting in Afganistan too long.  It is now time to become positive and build up the country by setting in place cooperative measures which were done in the UK after WW2, eg ration books, stamps, cooperative societies etc.  That way the people will have something to work towards instead of killing, burning and blowing themselves up.  It will work if they have something positive in their lives.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
